# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ddt.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ddt.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ddt.cir.prn.gs.pl ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ddt.cir.prn.gs.pl ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ddt.cir.prn.gs.pl PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ddt.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;analytic;ddt;bsrc;expression")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP ddt.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir.gen_gs COMMAND perl ddt.cir.prn.gs.pl ddt.cir.prn)
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir.gen_gs PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED ddt.cir)
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir.gen_gs PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP ddt.cir.gs)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir.gen_gs PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;analytic;ddt;bsrc;expression")
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} ddt.cir ddt.cir.prn.gs ddt.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED ddt.cir.gs)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}TIA/TRAP/ABM/ddt.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;analytic;ddt;bsrc;expression")
endif()
